short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate Lorem Ipsum text easily. Choose words, sentences, or paragraphs, and select the desired length for quick text generation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Description:
Lorem Ipsum Generator is a user-friendly Chrome extension that simplifies the generation of placeholder text effortlessly. With an intuitive interface, users can select text types—words, sentences, paragraphs, or HTML lists—alongside the desired count, providing instant Lorem Ipsum content with a single click. The extension offers a seamless, no-frills experience, allowing users to copy generated text instantly for use in designs, prototypes, or content placeholders, streamlining the process without distractions.

Key Features:

Simple interface for choosing text types and counts.
Instant generation of Lorem Ipsum content.
One-click copy to clipboard functionality.
Intuitive and hassle-free design for quick text creation.
Ideal for designers, developers, and content creators seeking placeholder text with ease.
